```{r setup}
library(coex)
```

Create a testing matrix of values
```{r}
ngenes <- 1000
nsamples <- 16
edat <- matrix(rnorm(ngenes*nsamples,mean=5,sd=2),ngenes,nsamples)
rownames(edat) <- 1:ngenes
```

Load the gene expression counts into a coexList object
```{r}
cl <- coexList(counts = edat)
cl
```

Normalise the data
```{r}

```

Calculate soft power thresholds for WGCNA network
```{r}
cl <- calcSoftPower(cl)
```

Check what the estimated power is
```{r}
cl@powerEstimate
```
Plot soft power estimates
```{r}
plotSoftPower(cl)
```
